tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns,Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cleaning,
review:
I can't speak highly enough about the exceptional care I received from Dr. Jerina George during my recent root canals, fillings & dental crowns procedure. From start to finish, the experience was outstanding. She took the time to thoroughly explain each step of the process, addressing all of my questions and concerns with patience and clarity.

Beyond her technical proficiency, Dr. Jerina George also took the time to listen to my concerns and preferences, and she tailored the treatment plan to meet my individual needs. I highly appreciate her dedication to patient care, and it made all the difference in my overall experience.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Jerina George to anyone in need of dental care ‚Äî you won't find a better dentist anywhere!
